# viabilityNotifications

**Instance Property**

An asynchronous sequence of service viability notifications produced by this service.

## Declaration

```swift
final var viabilityNotifications: some AsyncSequence<SMSService.ViabilityNotification, Never> { get throws }
```

## Discussion

Use a `for`-`await`-`in` loop to receive [doc://com.apple.availability/documentation/TelephonyMessagingKit/SMSService/ViabilityNotification] instances from this property.

## Determining service viabililty

- **isViable(for:)**: Queries whether the device can perform SMS operations at this time.
- **SMSService.ViabilityNotification**: A notification that indicates whether SMS is viable for a given cellular service.
